Lyrics: der hat ein feiste gaga Gans,
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: he has a meaty goo goo goose,
a gyri gyri goo goo goose!

Lyrics: Die hat ein langen, feisten, dicken, weidelichen Hals,
Poetic Translation: It has a lengthy, meaty, burly, pasture-fattened neck.

Lyrics: Rupf sie, zupf sie, feud sie, brat sie, z’reiss sie, friss sie!
Poetic Translation: Pull it, pluck it, boil it, roast it, carve it, eat it!
This is Saint Martin's precious bird;

Lyrics: dem können wir nit Feind sein!
Knecht Heinz, bring her ein guten Wein
Poetic Translation: Hey Bert, bring wine, the most preferred,

Lyrics: lass umhergahn, in Gottes Nam’ trinken wir gut Wein und Bier
Poetic Translation: Pass out the booze; by God, we do drink the finest wine and beer

Lyrics: auf die g’sottne Gans, auf die bratne Gans, auf die junge Gans,
Poetic Translation: to the simmered goose, to the roasted goose, to the tender goose:

Lyrics: dass sie uns nit schaden mag.
Poetic Translation: May no harm to us it do.
